scripts.2json: mkdir -p dist && cat assets/providers-final-2019-10-28.csv | yarn run csvtojson > dist/providers.json
scripts.rm1stlinefromjson: sed '1d' dist/providers.json > dist/providers.json.tmp && mv dist/providers.json.tmp dist/providers.json
scripts.everything: yarn run 2json && yarn run rm1stlinefromjson && yarn run buildindex && yarn run cpcriteria
